column5: Any fishing reports from Nester Falls area of LOTW? Water level? We will be heading there 1st week of June. Thanks
Here is a link to water levels. By the way....it's Nestor Falls. I'll be up there on the 13th for the rest of the summer.http://www.lwcb.ca/waterflowdata.html
I realized my mistake after posting but thought it might sneak by. Thanks for the link.
